sources.title: August Weekend
sources.description: Several people are invited to a Long Island Estate for the weekend and each of them has a different crisis to face. Before the weekend is over, most of their lives will change dramatically.

metadata.Plot: At a high-society dinner party, a wealthy, older and married man sets his sights on a beautiful young girl who's loved by a younger and not-so-wealthy man.
metadata.Actors: Valerie Hobson, Paul Harvey, G.P. Huntley
